1334070.name: Сон
1334070.description:
Sleep - is a horror in which you have to play as a person who is looking for the paranormal. There is a big BUT, this person is a skeptic and does not believe in the paranormal.

The game is divided into chapters, each chapter continues the previous story.



The game has a lot of game mechanics, you can encounter something unusual during the game, or you can not get to where you should at all.

  • Nice graphics
  • Interesting plot

Feel great fear being in a place where you can be killed or even driven crazy. These places may not be as you see, everything is possible is not true. Will you guess where the truth is and where the lie is.

Genre
  • Indie horror
  • Psychedelia
  • First person

Attention


The game has screeners and creepy sounds. People with a weak heart or suffering from panic attacks, epilepsy, etc.) do not recommend playing this game and even try it.

!!! Attention In This Game Very Bad English !!!
